title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package' occurred when performing the steps outlined in the bug report.
OB: After performing the steps, the package 'ui' is present in the destination folder 'xx'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the package 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' should be present in the destination folder 'xx'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the jdt.ui3 project.
2. Select the 'copy package' option from the context menu.
3. Choose 'xxx' as the destination folder.
